title.narrative: Enhancing the capacity and regulatory capabilities of the Chinese National Nuclear Regulatory Authority and its TSO, CH3.01/11

description.narrative: The overall objective of the project is to cooperate with Chinese stakeholders in enhancing and strengthening the nuclear safety regulatory regime in China in accordance with EU standards and best practice.EU knowledge and experience will be transferred to the Chinese regulatory body, the National Nuclear Safety Administration (NNSA), and its Technical Support Organisation, the Nuclear and Radiation Safety Centre (NSC), with a view to bringing their capabilities in accordance with best EU stan

description.narrative: Reported results indicators by the European Commission ¿ International Cooperation and Development (DEVCO) may not represent the complete set of indicators monitored for the project. The results are reported using a contribution approach. This means that where a project has been financed by the EU jointly with other funders ¿ such as partner country governments or other donors ¿ the overall outputs of the collective effort are reported rather than outputs attributed to the share of funding provided by the EU. For higher levels of results, such as outcomes and impacts, the project will only have contributed to the overall effort.
